name: Little World Of Creatures
description:
Are you ready?
Are you sure?

In Little World Of Creatures you Dash, You Smash and you Bash your way into other enemy creatures to collect there precious creature essence.
Survive for as long as you can and be the conqueror of the island. Don't let anyone stop you from your dream of domination. The more creatures you eat the more you grow, the more you grow the more your worth. Try to survive as the ruler of the land, or get eaten along the way.

Use your collected essence to purchase a variety of different creatures all with their own strengths and weaknesses. Little World Of Creatures is NOT Pay To Win everything can be earned in-game by just playing!


  • 10 Player Rooms
  • Collect Essence By Attacking Other Players
  • Use Your Essence To Purchase New Creatures

Some of the in-game creatures include...
WANT MORE INFO?Join our Discord community chat at https://discord.gg/xfHr3SJ to get involved with our ever continuing to grow community. Share ideas, Play with others or take part in our Tester program!
